name: MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate
desc: Defines the methods for receiving search completion data.

items.name: func completerDidUpdateResults(MKLocalSearchCompleter)
items.desc: Called when the specified search completer updates its array of search completions.

items.name: func completer(MKLocalSearchCompleter, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Called when the specified search completer is unable to generate a list of search results.
